creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Judy and Kenneth Dayton and their support of architecture in the Twin Cities
description: short ovoid form with handle on one short side and spout on opposite short side; one side of bowl decorated with image of Mt. Vernon; opposite side has eagle from U.S. Seal
medium: Porcelain with pink luster and black transfer decoration
title: Creamer, from Architects' Tea Set
